name: tenda-gaming-platform
description: Gaming Key Platform - Digital marketplace for gaming key distribution

scripts.build: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.setup: npm run install:all && npm run db:setup
scripts.db:setup: cd backend && npm run db:migrate && npm run db:seed
scripts.test: npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend
scripts.lint: npm run lint:backend && npm run lint:frontend
scripts.deploy: npm run build && cd backend && npm run deploy
scripts.deploy:dev: npm run build && cd backend && npm run deploy:dev
scripts.deploy:prod: npm run build && cd backend && npm run deploy:prod

author: Dhananjay Singh
